text: Jo tame ghayala thaya hoya to tamara virodhi loko pana avi ja rite ghayala tha'i gaya che, ame te divasone loko mate badalata rahi'e chi'e, (uhada yudhdhani hara) etala mate hati ke imanavala'o jahera kari dem ane tamara manthi ketalakane sahidano darajjo api'e, allaha ta'ala atyacari'othi mohabbata nathi karato
